settings.caption: Transparency
settings.heading: Of course you want to know where your pre-loved treasures end up.
settings.text: Redyoos is redefining transparency for the jewelry industry. We emphasize the circularity of diverting from landfills and the opportunity to see your pre-loved treasures become new resources.

settings.heading: Where DOES my jewelry go?
settings.text:
<insert 3 organizations>

We collaborate closely with partners at the local, regional, and national levels to redirect as much as we can away from landfills. Together, we strive to minimize waste and maximize the positive impact on our environment

settings.title: Our vision will require industry and government to work together with significant investment, large-scale innovation, transparency, and traceability. Together we can build an industry that designs products to beÂ used more, made to be made again and made from safe and recycled or renewable inputs.
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Transparency
settings.text: We carefully audit and track the materials we gather to maintain the trust and reliability of our service for you. Everything we collect is closely monitored to make sure it goes where it's meant to, keeping our promise to you intact.

settings.title: Transformative
settings.text: Jewelry recycling is a catalyst for transformation, empowering us to reimagine our relationship with the environment. Through conscious recycling practices, we not only reduce waste but also nurture a sustainable future for generations to come.

settings.title: Trust
settings.text: We value our community and your trust. Jewelry is made of precious metals but our most precious commodity, binding us together in our collective commitment to sustainability. With trust as Redyoos' foundation, we can confidently embark on the journey towards a greener, cleaner future.
